channel.title: Rotate your app’s client secrets :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Rotate your app’s client secrets Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Existing doc: no changes needed to fit the new IA Target personas: WIC App Developer, Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: Client secret rotation and key management: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/client-secret-rotation-key/main/ Why is this here?: No specific user research obtained for client secrets Client secrets are used in Authentication hence the reason why they are in Authenticate Page type: Task
